channel.title: Error in Client (every client)
channel.description:
When i start a RSPS client it starting up, then i log in. I can write and everything. But When i start walking PANG and the client is closed. This happen EVERY TIME ! This is the error code:
A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d8e7786, pid=4056, t d=5112
JRE version: 6.0_21-b07 Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (17.0-b17 mixed mode windows-amd64
Problematic frame: V [jvm.dll+0x57786]
An error report file with more information is saved as: C:\Users\Bruker\Desktop\StabbingScape V4 Client\StabbingScape Client v3\hs_err pid4056.log
If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp
HEEEEELP :(

item.title: Error in Client (every client)
item.dc:creator: @andiasaa andiasaa
item.description:
@andiasaa wrote:

I LOVE YOU !!! IT WORKED !!! TY !!!

Read full topic

item.title: Error in Client (every client)
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“andiasaa, post:3, topic:373680”]@echo off
COLOR 09
title StabbingScape client V3
@echo Client Is loading…
@echo -----------------------
java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32
pause

HELP MEH >.>[/quote]

Replace that with this:

@echo off
COLOR 09
title StabbingScape client V3
@echo Client Is loading......
@echo -----------------------
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32
pause

Read full topic
